Title: jSwipeKinetic - a touch optimized kinetic scroller
Description:
A jQuery plugin that enables you to add kinetic scrolling on your touch optimized projects. jSwipeKinetic is build on top of jGestures (jgestues.codeplex.com).

Including: the elastic effect made famous by ios and the abillity to swipe or drag an element.
HomeWiki:
jSwipeKinetic

A jQuery plugin that enables you to add kinetic scrolling on your touch optimized projects. jSwipeKinetic is build on top of jGestures (jgestues.codeplex.com).

Including: the elastic effect made famous by ios and the abillity to swipe or drag an element.

Example

 jQuery(document).ready(function () {
	 $('.jGestures_swipeKinetic').jSwipeKinetic({sSelectorItems: ' > li'})
});

Requires

  • jQuery: Get jQuery at http://jquery.com/
  • jGestures: Get jGestures at http://jgestures.codeplex.com/
